DOC.brief_summary: Delivery HFA albuterol antistatic valved hold chamber ( VHC ) improve bronchodilator response nocturnal bronchospasm .
DOC.brief_title: Response Albuterol Delivered Through Anti-static Valved Holding Chamber During Nocturnal Bronchospasm
DOC.criteria: Age 1865 year . Physician diagnosis asthma . FEV1 6080 % predict day . FEV1 increase ≥ 12 % ≥ 80 % predict 2 4 puff albuterol HFA MDI deliver antistatic VHC . No smoke previous year < 10pack year history . No history severe asthma attack require ER visit hospitalization previous three month . Patient require short course oral steroid past 30 day . Any disease inadequately control medication would worsen asthma interact asthma medication . History viral respiratory tract infection 3 week prior screen visit . Positive pregnancy test .
